EmailTemplate.description: Internal Terminated Notification -for RVAR Combo Dealers
EmailTemplate.name: Term: Internal Terminated Notification - Combo dealer
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Account.Name} | Terminated (as Residential Dealer only)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
https://login.salesforce.com/{!Account.Id}
{!Account.Name} is no longer a Residential Dealer. Account type has been changed to Partner-Commercial.
Thank You,
Partner Management Residential and Light Commercial Business Unit
77 Rio Robles San Jose, CA 95134 Phone: 408.240.5580 Fax: 408.240.5400 www.sunpowercorp.com
